attr.title: Mago
attr.desc: A classic magical adventure with beautiful pixel art and intuitive controls. Travel a vast world with many levels, mini-games, and secret locations!
attr.inst: Install portfiles. Download the windows version of the game on Steam. Copy all gamefiles to the mago portfolder.
attr.inst_md:
- Install portfiles.
- Download the windows version of the game on Steam.
- Copy all gamefiles to the mago portfolder.
